transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir, very good morning. Main Ranjit baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se. Sir ye na aapka ek category hai jisme aapne star mein usko select kiya hua hai but usme koi product added nahi hai. Aquarium filter karke hai sir. Isliye main call kiya hun.
Customer: Sir aap kahan se bol rahe hain?
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar raha hun.
Executive: IndiaMART pe sir ye aapka product hai aquarium filter karke category hai. Jisko aapne star mein search kiya select kiya hua hai star city combination wale mein aur usme sir koi bhi product apna listed nahi hai. To isliye main confirm karna chah raha tha ki aquarium filter mein karte hain to isko add kar lijiye agar nahi karte to isko hata kar ke aur wahan pe koi aur dusra category aap add kar sakte hain sir.
Customer: Sir actually kya hai aap logon ka na system thoda sa hum exactly aisa nahi kar sakte kyunki na mera foam hai jo usme lagta hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Nahi sir usme aquarium filter hai na. Main ye keh raha hun aquarium filter na kai tarah ke aate hain hamare paas foam filter jo hote hain. To wo foam filter us pure aquarium filter mein lagta hai. To humne isliye aquarium foam filter dal rakha hai taki agar koi search koi lena chahe to usko at least hamari entry dikh jaye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aquarium foam filter mein. Ek screenshot main na aapke WhatsApp pe ek screenshot bhej raha hun. Aap usko dekhenge to shayad aapko wo clear ho jayega. Ek second dijiyega just mujhe.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Abhi ye mere ko Saloni ji ka bhi. Ha ha Saloni mam Saloni mam ne hi mujhe bataya hua bataya hai aapko call karne ke liye main Ranjit baat kar raha hun sir isliye main aapko call kiya hun.
Customer: Kya hai kya karna hai hamare ko ye?
Executive: Ha ha isko ya to agar hum isme deal karte hain na to isko isme product list kar lenge agar nahi karte to isko hata kar ke dusra yahan pe category hum add kar lenge sir.
Customer: Karte to hain but.
Executive: To agar aap karte hain to jaise aapne bataya aquarium foam filter hota hai na to aap kahiye to main isko is category se na aquarium foam filter mein add karte raha hun sir.
Customer: Aquarium filter jo hai na.
Customer: Sorry ek minute. Ha ji.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hi doctor yes sir.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Nahi upgrade to lena hai mere ko jana pad raha hai main aaj aa hi raha tha.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Samjha nahi main.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir main aapko karta hun thodi der mein aur sir isko na maine correct kar diya just mujhe ye bata dijiye ki aquarium foam filter jo hai usme hi main map karte hue chalega na. Jo aquarium foam filter hai usme maine aquarium filter ko us us category ko maine map kar diya aquarium foam filter product se.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Sir ji aawaz aa rahi hai?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Mam main aapko na payment wahin karunga cash payment hi online nahi karta. Haan ji haan. To main aapko.
Customer: Matlab kal hi ka din to reh gaya. Aur kal aap ho nahi. Wahi to main keh raha hun na.
Customer: Sir main dekh lunga. Main dekhunga jitna ho payega to main kal karwa dunga.
Customer: Main I am not I am not saying ki ho jayega but agar main paas mein raha ya I have some time tomorrow main definitely aake upgrade leke chala jaunga aur fir aapko next week mein aakhri session hai aur then of course upgrade ke next week plan karenge wo to koi issue hai hi nahi. Kyunki mujhko aaj hi ye karna pad raha hai isliye maine subah hi unko cancel kiya hai. Maine aise raat ko bhi nahi kiya. Kyunki mere ko subah.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi abhi nahi. Nahi nahi nahi main main kal tak dekhta hun mam. Aap jao itna jaldi nahi hai main kal tak dekhta hun if I can come I will be there tomorrow aur main kal aake chala jaunga. Kyunki main aapka appointment kal bhi dekh raha tha kal raat ko hi ki can I shift the appointment but usme aaya ki you have no slots doctor Khushi karke hai unka naam aa raha tha.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive: Customer's product category has no listed products.

- Customer: Wants to add foam filter to aquarium filter.

- Customer: Wants to pay in cash.



Resolution:

- Executive: Offered to add product or remove category.

- Executive: Mapped aquarium filter to aquarium foam filter.

- Customer: Will visit for upgrade if time permits.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will check tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- category, aquarium filter, foam filter, payment, upgrade
